PersonalStatement.text: Toni Davis, born on 1972-02-10, is a Male based in South Joshuaport, French Southern Territories. He is Married and holds French nationality. Currently working at Dawson Ltd.

WorkExperience.text: Project Manager at White-Young from 2009 to 2020.
Senior Research Scientist at Dawson Ltd, 2023 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from Sharif University of Technology
Master's in Engineering from Universiti Tunku Abdul Rahman (UTAR)

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.
Leadership: Proven track record of managing cross-functional teams.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys coding personal projects.
